about_the_game:
We will be involved in solving problems that occur within the school you are transferring to.
You can progress through the game by talking to characters and inspecting things.
When it comes to the operation part, you will complete the missions listed in the notes on the menu.


Confidence
The main character, Kyoya Kurusu, transfers to another school due to certain circumstances.
There, he witnesses a girl being bullied.
Kyoya was starting to get himself involved and was starting to catch fire.
He decided to lurk in the shadows and take revenge.


Contents
CHAPTER.1 Bullying Retaliation Edition
CHAPTER.2 Sense of justice confirmation game
CHAPTER.3 Specific climate conference edition
Chapter 4 Sacrifice Vote Exam Edition

CHAPTER can be selected after selecting START.

Play time

5-6 hours

How to operate

←↑→↓ key move
Z/Enter key Check/Decide
X/Esc key menu/cancel
Shift key dash
Ctrl key backlog
